title: (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of 

Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2025. 

(2) The Principal Regulations, the European Union (Protection of Animals 
used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2013 (S.I. No. 434 of 
2013), the European Union (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 174 of 2014), the European Union 
(Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 
2016 (S.I. No. 552 of 2016), the European Union (Protection of Animals used 
for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2018 (S.I. No. 553 of 2018), 
the European Union (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 324 of 2020), and the European Union 
(Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 
2022 (S.I. No. 205 of 2022) and these Regulations may be cited together as the 
European Union (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) 
Regulations 2012 to 2025.

title: (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: 4. Regulation 3(1) (as last amended by Regulation 3 of the European Union
text_raw:
4. Regulation 3(1) (as last amended by Regulation 3 of the European Union 
(Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 324 of 2020)) of the Principal Regulations is amended by 
substituting for the definition of “Directive” the following definition: 

“‘Directive’ means Directive 2010/63/EU of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 22 September 20102 as amended by Commission 
Delegated Directive (EU) 2024/1262 of 13 March 20241;”. 

1 OJ L 2024/1262, 15.5.2024. 
2 OJ No. L 276, 20.10.2010, p.33. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 15th July, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [316] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 July, 2025. 

JENNIFER CARROLL MACNEILL, 

Minister for Health. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [316]

title: (Protection of Animals used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the European Union (Protection of Animals used for 
Scientific Purposes) Regulations 2012 to give further effect to Commission 
Delegated Directive (EU) 2024/1262 of 13 March 2024 amending Directive 
2010/63/EU of the European Parliament and the Council of 22 September 2010 
as regards the requirements for establishments and for the care and 
accommodation of animals, and as regards the method of killing animals. 

Commission Delegated Directive (EU) 2024/1262 amends Annex III of 
Directive 2010/63/EU (which lays down requirements for establishments and for 
the care and accommodation of animals used for scientific purposes) as well as 
Annex IV thereof (which lays down appropriate species-specific killing methods 
for animals used for scientific purposes). 

These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Protection of Animals 
used for Scientific Purposes) (Amendment) Regulations 2025 and come into 
operation on 4 December 2026. 

 
 
 
 
 [316] 5
